image: [![Oh, the Places You'll Go!](https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/7186aAI6FFL._SL1500_.jpg'Oh, the Places You'll Go!')](https://bookshop.org/a/113618/9780679805274)
Title: [Oh, the Places You'll Go!](https://bookshop.org/a/113618/9780679805274) (Hardcover)
Author: Dr. Seuss
Synopsis: From soaring to high heights and seeing great sights to being left in a Lurch on a prickle-ly perch, Dr. Seuss addresses life’s ups and downs with his trademark humorous verse and whimsical illustrations.
Publisher: Random House Books for Young Readers (January 22, 1990)

Title: [The Very Hungry Caterpillar](https://bookshop.org/a/113618/9780399226908) (Hardcover)
Author: Eric Carle
Synopsis: Follow along as one of nature’s loveliest marvels eats his way through an amazing variety of foods as he prepares to grow into a beautiful butterfly! Children will love the strikingly bold, colorful pictures against a simple text in large, clear type.

image: [![Brown Bear, Brown Bear, What Do You See?](https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/71vqiV3MnPL._SL1500_.jpg'Brown Bear, Brown Bear, What Do You See?')](https://bookshop.org/a/113618/9780805092448)
Title: [Brown Bear, Brown Bear, What Do You See?](https://bookshop.org/a/113618/9780805092448) (Hardcover)
Author: Bill Martin Jr. and Eric Carle
Synopsis: A beloved children story, now available in beginning reader format.

Title: [Goodnight Moon](https://bookshop.org/a/113618/9780694003617) (Board Book)
Author: Margaret Wise Brown
Synopsis: In a great green room, tucked away in bed, is a little bunny. "Goodnight room, goodnight moon." And to all the familiar things in the softly lit room—to the picture of the three little bears sitting on chairs, to the clocks and his socks, to the mittens and the kittens, to everything one by one—the little bunny says goodnight.

Title: [Love You Forever](https://bookshop.org/a/113618/9780920668375) (Paperback)
Author: Robert Munsch
Synopsis: Since publication in l986, Love You Forever has sold more than 30 million copies in paperback and the regular hardcover edition (as well as hundreds of thousands of copies in Spanish and French).

image: [![I Love you to the Moon and Back](https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/81y8aCy-20L._SL1500_.jpg'I Love you to the Moon and Back')](https://bookshop.org/a/113618/9781664300545)
Title: [I Love you to the Moon and Back](https://bookshop.org/a/113618/9781664300545) (Hardcover)
Author: Amelia Hepworth and Tim Warnes
Synopsis: Show your child just how strong your love is every minute of the day with this sweet, gentle rhyme that's perfect for sharing. Now in a jacketed hardcover format!
